item.title: sampling method in detail
item.description: Basic Inverse Transform Sampling Rejection Sampling Importance Sampling This page talks about how to sample from the distribution. We will go over well known sampling techniques and try to implement with various examples. Basic What it means to calcaulte the variance with mean 0? \[ Var[X]= \int_{-\infty}^{\infty} x^2 f(x)dx \] when \(f(x)\) is \(N(1,2)\). Then \(f(x)\) is \[\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi\sigma^2}}\cdot\exp\left(-(x-\mu)^2/2\sigma^2\right)\] where \(\mu\) is 0 and \(\sigma\) is 2.
